tag_list: symfony, symfony2, zend, php, doctrine, lamp, project, developers, ctos, it-director, it-managers, project-and-programme-managment, senior-appointments, programming, on-shoring, search-and-selection, headhunting, technical-team-creation-
overview:
Maria is a Senior IT Recruitment Consultant, specialising in Symfony development from junior developers to visionary CTO’s.

Over the years Maria has forged exceptionally strong networks allowing her to offer specific candidate pools of permanent & contract professionals within the Symfony and more general PHP Space. She is particularly skilled at identifying key staff for Start-ups and has placed a number of game changing CTO’s into new companies in the London area.

Maria is fully trained in complex interviewing techniques, technical testing, multi-level communication, networking, beyond the job spec matching and efficient process management.

She is responsible for reacting to her clientâ€™s requirements with high speed and accuracy using her established network and database together with targeted headhunting and referrals.

Maria recruit’s for digital agencies, technology companies and end-user IT departments, of all types and sizes from multinational blue chips, to small yet nimble independent, high growth businesses.

Much of Maria’s work is in London and the Home Counties however, she is not restricted and has clients and candidates all over the UK and Europe.
